mapper.insert: INSERT INTO station (stationName, locationX, locationY, open) VALUES (#{stationName}, #{locationX}, #{locationY}, #{open})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, (SELECT COUNT(serialNum) FROM kickboard k WHERE k.stationNum = s.stationNum) FROM station s
mapper.update: UPDATE station SET stationName=#{stationName}, open=#{open}, locationX=#{locationX}, locationY=#{locationY} WHERE stationNum=#{stationNum}
